title: Strengthening Customer Service Practical Competencies: Social Constructivist Approaches for Global Leadership Language Proficiency Enhancement

context.prior_knowledge: Basic language proficiency and exposure to international business environments
context.additional_context: Customer service competency enhancement program for service/customer-facing role practitioners

learning_goals: Learners complete work-related language tasks with multinational team members with over 80% success.
Learners engage in meaningful interactions at least three times per week in online discussions based on sociocultural constructivist principles.
Learners achieve at least 70% proficiency in language use assessments applied to real-world business scenarios.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
